ComicInfo.Title: Crime Busters Actual Cases from True Reports; Comic Book Fans; Myron Watches Spider Catch the Fly; Nine to Five; Myron Climbs a Ladder into a Panel; Myron Cannot Enter the Comic Panel; Myron Gets Rolled up by the Comic Panel Itself; Myron Tries to Lift Weights; Travels with Myron; Little Myro 'n Slumberland; Myron of the Apes; Myron and the Pirates
